HeroBanner.Title: Anomaly Detection
HeroBanner.SubText: Detect and resolve anomalies at scale to prevent downtime

MainBody.BeginningParagraph: Wherever you work with data, you'll find anomalies. In increasingly rich information ecosystems, manually detecting and resolving those anomalies can seem like an impossible task. OpenSearch's built-in capabilities give you the power to create automated, intelligent workflows that identify anomalies so you can resolve them proactively and minimize disruption.

ThreeCard_row.SubText: Discover point anomalies or global outliers like unusually large transfers of funds.
Uncover contextual anomalies such as unexpected surges in usage or consumption.
Observe collective anomalies, including unusual web traffic from a cluster of IP addresses

ImageRight_row.SubText: Eliminate delays to detection and resolution, minimize manual monitoring and troubleshooting, and bridge gaps in visibility to provide insights at scale. With OpenSearch, you can create and configure detectors that expose anomalies, deliver highly observable results, and send alerts in near real-time.

Feature_array.Title: Real time data ingestion and indexing
Feature_array.SubText: Continuously collect and index data from multiple sources to ensure you’re conducting anomaly detection on the most up-to-date information.

Feature_array.Title: Advanced anomaly detection algorithms
Feature_array.SubText: Leverage cutting-edge AI and machine learning algorithms to identify problems in your ingested data, including univariate, multivariate, and contextual anomalies.

Feature_array.Title: Flexible alerting and notifications
Feature_array.SubText: Our Anomaly Detection tools enable customizable alerts and notifications you can use to inform your stakeholders and resolve issues proactively.

Feature_array.Title: Scalable and distributed architecture
Feature_array.SubText: OpenSearch’s distributed, highly scalable nature helps you ingest, process, and analyze large volumes of data without compromising performance.

Feature_array.Title: Seamless integration with existing toolsets
Feature_array.SubText: Easily integrate OpenSearch into the monitoring, observability, and IT service management (ITSM) tools you already use to maintain seamless continuity with existing technology investments and workflows.

left_Paragraph.Text:
A proactive approach to anomaly detection puts you in control of your data.

By getting ahead of disruption, you improve data quality and maximize uptime to keep operations consistent and secure.

Feature_array.Title: Proactive issue identification
Feature_array.SubText: Quickly detect anomalies in your data to identify and address potential issues before they escalate, reducing the impact on business operations and customer experience.

Feature_array.Title: Enhanced security and compliance
Feature_array.SubText: Identify and investigate security threats and demonstrate compliance with industry regulations and standards.

Feature_array.Title: Scalability and future-proofing
Feature_array.SubText: Scalable and flexible architecture expands your anomaly detection capabilities seamlessly as data volume grows alongside infrastructure complexity.

Feature_array.Title: Improved operational efficiency
Feature_array.SubText: Gain an AI advantage that helps you rapidly identify and resolve anomalies to optimize processes, reduce manual troubleshooting, and smooth operations.

Feature_array.Title: Informed decision-making
Feature_array.SubText: OpenSearch delivers the insights and contextual information you need to make data-driven decisions, optimize resource allocation, and improve strategic planning.
